text: laqad aghtrr alkufaar wabawhm bal'imhal lima ra'awh min al'amwal walbanin wtwl alaemar, faqamu ealaa kufruhum la yabrhwnh, wazanuu 'anahum la yuedhdhabwn waqad ghafalu ean sunnat madyt, fallah yunqas al'ard min jwanbha bima ynzlh balmshrkyn min bas fi kl nahiat wmin hzymt, aykwn biwuse kafaar "mk" alkhuruj ean qudrat allh, 'aw alaimtinae min almwt?
